segments.text: Mmm, that was ‘Candy Rain’ by Soul For Real—smooth, sweet, and still hittin’ after all these years!
It’s that kind of track that just melts into your soul like a summer sunset, right?
But hold up—we’re keepin’ it movin’ and groovin’ with a certified early-2000s *banger* comin’ your way!
Yup, it’s Amerie with ‘1 Thing’—that funky go-go beat that makes you move whether you want to or not!
Fun fact—this track dropped 20 years ago and it *still* feels fresh. That’s the magic of a timeless rhythm, y’all!
You’re vibin’ with Alice right here on the station that brings you the best in R&B and hip hop—old school, new school, all soul.
So turn it up, sing along, or hit that little two-step wherever you are—Amerie’s comin’ in hot!
